meta.title: About Us
meta.description: Learn more about our mission and team

hero.label: About Us
hero.description: We're on a mission to help developers build better products faster. Our team is passionate about creating tools that make a real difference.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower developers with the tools they need to build exceptional products without reinventing the wheel.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where developers can focus on innovation instead of boilerplate code and repetitive tasks.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Quality, simplicity, and developer experience are at the heart of everything we build.

team.label: Our Team
team.title: Meet the People Behind the Product
team.description: A small but mighty team dedicated to building the best developer tools.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of developers who are building faster with our platform.
